title: Lost Words: Beyond the Page :: A Beautiful Journey through Loss and Recovery ::

media:group.media:title: Lost Words: Beyond the Page :: A Beautiful Journey through Loss and Recovery ::
media:group.media:description:
Lost Words: Beyond the Page is an atmospheric adventure puzzle-platform game with a watercolor aesthetic, written by Rhianna Pratchett, developed by Sketchbook Games and published by Modus Games. The game was exclusively released for Stadia on March 27 2020, and was eventually released on Nintendo Switch, PC, PlayStation 4, and Xbox One on April 6 2021.
The age rating is "E" (Everyone) from ESRB and for PAL regions PEGI 7.

I hope that this video can be equally enjoyed by those who want a condensed impressionistic playthrough experience as well as those who want to get a feel for the game to help them decide if they want to play it.

The game features the "Stages of Grief" (based on the Kübler-Ross model) - so if you're going through a traumatic period, please take care.

I played Lost Words on XBOX GamePass.
